children.name: Get an overview of your Sales and Operations Planning Process

blocks.text: This Dashboard provides a high-level overview of a Sales and Operations planning process (IBP). It highlights some key KPIs as well as a high-level analysis of the process to identify areas to investigate further.
Page 1: Discovery - A process model from your event log data, displays the most common process paths
Page 3: Demand Planning - High-level analysis of demand planning use cases
Page 4: Supply Planning - High-level analysis of supply planning use cases
Please see our Dashboard Documentation for more information on how to manage your dashboards.

If you feel our Dashboards helped you during your analysis, please share some feedback regarding improvement ideas, wishes, and problems. We always try to improve and extend the Dashboard Templates to provide you with the best experience possible. You can submit your feedback here.

children.name: User Guide - Process Conformance checker widget
children.description: Choose this widget to (a) display various activities (b) map the process against BPMN process model

blocks.text: The aim of Variant Explorer Widget is to discover the various process paths. You can display several variants at a time.
Before you start, make sure that a BPMN model is created via "Generate BPMN" (top right corner) or linked. Read more on how to link a BPMN process in section Create an investigation.
For further information, check Signavio Documentation here.

children.name: Number of cases
children.description: Number of combinations (Product ID + Month) part of the process

dataSource.query: SELECT count(case_id) FROM THIS_PROCESS

children.name: Number of products
children.description: Distinct number of Product ID

dataSource.query: SELECT count(DISTINCT "product id") FROM THIS_PROCESS

children.name: Number of Cases per Product Family
children.description: Number of combinations per Product Family in the process

dataSource.query:
SELECT COUNT (CASE_ID) AS "# Cases" , "Product Family" 
FROM THIS_PROCESS
ORDER BY 1 desc
Limit 10

children.name: Percentage of cases where Statistical Forecast Quantity Error is above 30%
children.description: Percentage of cases in a certain period in the past where Statistical Forecast Quantity Error is above 30%

dataSource.query:
SELECT
COUNT(case_id) FILTER(
	WHERE "Statistical Fcst Qty Error (%)" > 350
	AND (DATE_TRUNC('month', NOW()) - "MONTH") < DURATION '320days'
	AND (DATE_TRUNC('month', NOW())) > "MONTH"
	)
/
COUNT(case_id) FILTER(
	WHERE (DATE_TRUNC('month', NOW())) > "MONTH"
	AND (DATE_TRUNC('month', NOW()) - "MONTH") < DURATION '320days'
	AND "Statistical Fcst Qty Error (%)" <> 0
)
* 100
FROM THIS_PROCESS

children.name: Percentage of products with at least one period (month) where demand is not fulfilled
children.description: Percentage of products with at least one period (month) where demand is not fulfilled

dataSource.query:
SELECT
COUNT("case_id") FILTER(
	WHERE(
	"Consensus Demand Delivered" <> "Consensus Demand"
	)
    AND "MONTH" >= (DATE_TRUNC('month', NOW()))    
    AND ("MONTH" - DATE_TRUNC('month', NOW())) < DURATION '320days'
    AND "Consensus Demand" > 0 
)
/
COUNT("case_id") FILTER(
	WHERE "Consensus Demand" > 0
    AND "MONTH" >= (DATE_TRUNC('month', NOW()))    
    AND ("MONTH" - DATE_TRUNC('month', NOW())) < DURATION '320days'
) * 100
FROM THIS_PROCESS

children.name: Number of Events per day of the week
children.description: Number of Events per day of the week

dataSource.query:
SELECT COUNT ("event_name") AS "# Events",
CASE DATE_PART('day_of_week', end_time) 
	WHEN 0 THEN 'Monday' 
    WHEN 1 THEN 'Tuesday' 
    WHEN 2 THEN 'Wednesday' 
    WHEN 3 THEN 'Thursday'
    WHEN 4 THEN 'Friday'
    WHEN 5 THEN 'Saturday'
    ELSE 		'Sunday'
    END AS "Day of the week"
FROM FLATTEN(THIS_PROCESS)
ORDER BY 1 DESC

children.name: Cycle time of Demand Planning
children.description: Average time taken from starting to complete the Demand Planning step

dataSource.query:
SELECT
(AVG ((SELECT AVG (END_TIME) FILTER (
	WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Complete Demand Planning')
	AND "Step Status" = 'COMPLETED')) 
)
-
AVG ((SELECT AVG (END_TIME) FILTER (
	WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Start Demand Planning')
	AND "Step Status" = 'COMPLETED')) 
)
) *8*14
FROM THIS_PROCESS

children.name: Cycle Time of Supply Planning
children.description: Average time taken from starting to complete the Supply Planning step

dataSource.query:
SELECT
(
AVG ((SELECT AVG (END_TIME) FILTER (
	WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Complete Supply Planning')
	AND "Step Status" = 'COMPLETED')) 
)
-
AVG ((SELECT AVG (END_TIME) FILTER (
	WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Start Supply Planning')
	AND "Step Status" = 'COMPLETED')) 
)
) * 14
FROM THIS_PROCESS

children.name: Statistical forecast quantity bias rate
children.description: Percentage of cases in a certain period where Statistical Forecast Quantity Bias is above 10% or less then -10%

dataSource.query:
SELECT
COUNT(case_id) FILTER(
	WHERE ("Statistical Fcst Qty Bias (%)" > 350
	OR "Statistical Fcst Qty Bias (%)" < -10)
	AND (DATE_TRUNC('month', NOW())) > "MONTH"
	AND (DATE_TRUNC('month', NOW()) - "MONTH") < DURATION '200days'
	)
/
COUNT(case_id) FILTER(
	WHERE "Statistical Fcst Qty Bias (%)" <> 0
	AND (DATE_TRUNC('month', NOW())) > "MONTH"
	AND (DATE_TRUNC('month', NOW()) - "MONTH") < DURATION '200days'
) * 100
FROM THIS_PROCESS

children.name: Percentage of products without forecast
children.description: Percentage of products which could not be forecasted by the forecasting algorithm

dataSource.query:
SELECT
COUNT(DISTINCT("Product ID")) FILTER(
	WHERE (
		SELECT SUM("Statistical Fcst Qty") = 0
	)
AND "Material Type ID" = 'FERT'
)
/
COUNT(DISTINCT ("Product ID")) FILTER(
	WHERE "Material Type ID" = 'FERT'
)
* 100
FROM THIS_PROCESS

children.name: Percentage of products with unconsumed forecast
children.description: Percentage of products with an open forecast in a certain period

dataSource.query:
SELECT
COUNT(case_id) FILTER(
	WHERE "Forecast Open Output" > 0
	AND (DATE_TRUNC('month', NOW())) > "MONTH"
	AND (DATE_TRUNC('month', NOW()) - "MONTH") < DURATION '200days'
	)
/
COUNT(case_id) FILTER(
	WHERE "Consensus Demand Plan Qty" <> 0
	AND (DATE_TRUNC('month', NOW())) > "MONTH"
	AND (DATE_TRUNC('month', NOW()) - "MONTH") < DURATION '200days'
) * 55.47
FROM THIS_PROCESS

children.name: Combinations over or under forecasted
children.description: Percentage of cases in a certain period where Statistical Forecast Quantity Bias is above 10% or less then -10%

dataSource.query:
SELECT
COUNT(case_id) FILTER(
	WHERE ("Statistical Fcst Qty Bias (%)" > 10
	OR "Statistical Fcst Qty Bias (%)" < -10)
	AND (DATE_TRUNC('month', NOW())) > "MONTH"
	AND (DATE_TRUNC('month', NOW()) - "MONTH") < DURATION '200days'
	)
/
COUNT(case_id) FILTER(
	WHERE "Statistical Fcst Qty Bias (%)" <> 0
	AND (DATE_TRUNC('month', NOW())) > "MONTH"
	AND (DATE_TRUNC('month', NOW()) - "MONTH") < DURATION '200days'
) * 30
FROM THIS_PROCESS

children.name: Percentage of products with considerable forecast override
children.description: Percentage of products for which the difference between statistical forecast and final consensus demand is considerable in a certain period

dataSource.query:
SELECT
COUNT(DISTINCT "Product ID") FILTER(
	WHERE( 
		((("Consensus Demand Plan Qty" - "Statistical Fcst Qty") 
		/
		"Statistical Fcst Qty") * 100
		) > 20
	OR
		((("Consensus Demand Plan Qty" - "Statistical Fcst Qty") 
		/
		"Statistical Fcst Qty") * 100
		) < -20
	)
	AND "MONTH" >= (DATE_TRUNC('month', NOW()))
	AND ("MONTH" - DATE_TRUNC('month', NOW())) < DURATION '320days'
	)
/
COUNT(DISTINCT "Product ID") FILTER(
	WHERE "Statistical Fcst Qty" > 0
	AND "MONTH" >= (DATE_TRUNC('month', NOW()))
	AND ("MONTH" - DATE_TRUNC('month', NOW())) < DURATION '320days'
	) * 24.98
FROM THIS_PROCESS

children.name: Demand Planning KPIs
children.description: Below you can check the KPIs that describe demand planning state from accuracy and efficiency perspective

blocks.text: Below you can check the KPIs that describe demand planning state from accuracy and efficiency perspective

children.name: Demand analysis per segments
children.description: Number of cases and total Consensus Demands per ABC Code

dataSource.query:
SELECT count (Case_ID) As Cases, sum ("Consensus Demand") AS "Demand", "ABC Id"
FROM THIS_PROCESS
Where "ABC Id" is not null
ORDER BY 3

children.name: Statistical forecast quantity error rate
children.description: Percentage of cases in a certain period in the past where Statistical Forecast Quantity Error is above 30%

dataSource.query:
SELECT
COUNT(case_id) FILTER(
	WHERE "Statistical Fcst Qty Error (%)" > 350
	AND (DATE_TRUNC('month', NOW()) - "MONTH") < DURATION '320days'
	AND (DATE_TRUNC('month', NOW())) > "MONTH"
	)
/
COUNT(case_id) FILTER(
	WHERE (DATE_TRUNC('month', NOW())) > "MONTH"
	AND (DATE_TRUNC('month', NOW()) - "MONTH") < DURATION '320days'
	AND "Statistical Fcst Qty Error (%)" <> 0
)
* 100
FROM THIS_PROCESS

children.name: Statistical Forecast Quantity per Product Family
children.description: Statistical Forecast Quantity per Product Family

children.name: Cycle time of Demand Planning
children.description: Average time taken from 'Start Demand Planning' to 'Complete Demand Planning'

dataSource.query:
SELECT
(AVG ((SELECT AVG (END_TIME) FILTER (
	WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Complete Demand Planning')
	AND "Step Status" = 'COMPLETED')) 
)
-
AVG ((SELECT AVG (END_TIME) FILTER (
	WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Start Demand Planning')
	AND "Step Status" = 'COMPLETED')) 
)
) *8*14
FROM THIS_PROCESS

children.name: Market forecast override rate
children.description: Percentage of combinations where the market forecast was overwritten manually by a planner

children.name: Sales forecast override rate
children.description: Percentage of combinations where the sales forecast was overwritten manually by a planner

children.name: Products with manually updated sales history
children.description: Number of products for which sales history was updated manually by planners for a certain period

dataSource.query:
SELECT
COUNT(DISTINCT "Product ID") FILTER(
	WHERE ( SELECT COUNT(1) WHERE "Source of Change" = 'Excel Add-In - Planning View'
				AND "event_name" = 'Gather & Cleanse Historical Data'
				AND (DATE_TRUNC('month', NOW())) > "MONTH"
				AND (DATE_TRUNC('month', NOW()) - "MONTH") < DURATION '200days'
    ) > 0
) + 12
FROM THIS_PROCESS

children.name: Supply Planning KPIs
children.description: Below you can check the KPIs that describe supply planning state from fulfillment and efficiency perspective

blocks.text: Below you can check the KPIs that describe supply planning state from fulfillment and efficiency perspective

children.name: Demand Fulfillment analysis per segments
children.description: Number of cases and total Consensus Demand Delivered per ABC Code

dataSource.query:
SELECT count (Case_ID) AS "Cases", sum ("Consensus Demand Delivered") AS "Fulfilled Demand", "ABC Id"
FROM THIS_PROCESS
Where "ABC Id" is not null
ORDER BY 3

children.name: Demand Fulfillment analysis per Product Family
children.description: Consensus Demand Delivered compared to Consensus Demand per Product Family

children.name: Cycle Time of Supply Planning
children.description: Average time taken from starting to complete the Supply Planning step

dataSource.query:
SELECT
(
AVG ((SELECT AVG (END_TIME) FILTER (
	WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Complete Supply Planning')
	AND "Step Status" = 'COMPLETED')) 
)
-
AVG ((SELECT AVG (END_TIME) FILTER (
	WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Start Supply Planning')
	AND "Step Status" = 'COMPLETED')) 
)
)* 14
FROM THIS_PROCESS

children.name: Perfect demand fulfillment rate
children.description: Percentage of combinations in a certain period with consensus demand delivered equal to consensus demand

dataSource.query:
SELECT
COUNT("case_id") FILTER(
	WHERE(
	"Consensus Demand Delivered" = "Consensus Demand"
	)
    AND "MONTH" >= (DATE_TRUNC('month', NOW()))    
    AND ("MONTH" - DATE_TRUNC('month', NOW())) < DURATION '320days'
    AND "Consensus Demand" > 0 
)
/
COUNT("case_id") FILTER(
	WHERE "Consensus Demand" > 0
    AND "MONTH" >= (DATE_TRUNC('month', NOW()))    
    AND ("MONTH" - DATE_TRUNC('month', NOW())) < DURATION '320days'
) * 370
FROM THIS_PROCESS

children.name: Capacity over-utilization
children.description: Number of combinations with capacity utilization is more than 100% in a certain period

dataSource.query:
SELECT
COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
	WHERE "Capacity Utilization" > 1
	AND "MONTH" >= (DATE_TRUNC('month', NOW()))
	AND ("MONTH" - DATE_TRUNC('month', NOW())) < DURATION '320days'
) + 63
FROM THIS_PROCESS

children.name: Demand unfulfilled rate
children.description: Percentage of products with consensus demand higher than the delivered in a certain period

dataSource.query:
SELECT
COUNT( DISTINCT "Product ID") FILTER(
	WHERE "Consensus Demand" > "Consensus Demand Delivered" 
	AND "Consensus Demand" <> 0
	AND "MONTH" >= (DATE_TRUNC('month', NOW()))
	AND ("MONTH" - DATE_TRUNC('month', NOW())) < DURATION '320days'
)
/
COUNT( DISTINCT "Product ID") FILTER(
	WHERE "Consensus Demand" <> 0
	AND "MONTH" >= (DATE_TRUNC('month', NOW()))
	AND ("MONTH" - DATE_TRUNC('month', NOW())) < DURATION '320days'
)
* 8.23
FROM THIS_PROCESS

children.name: Not planning relevant products
children.description: Number of products which are not relevant for supply chain planning

dataSource.query:
SELECT
COUNT(DISTINCT "Product ID") FILTER(
	WHERE "PLM Status" = '6' 
	AND ("Receipts" <> 0 OR "Projected Stock" <> 0)
	AND "MONTH" >= (DATE_TRUNC('month', NOW()))
	AND ("MONTH" - DATE_TRUNC('month', NOW())) < DURATION '320days'
) 
FROM THIS_PROCESS

children.name: Percentage of products not touched by supply planning
children.description: Number of products affected by a supply operator execution

dataSource.query:
SELECT
COUNT(DISTINCT "Product ID") FILTER (
	WHERE (
		SELECT SUM("Receipts") = 0
		WHERE "MONTH" >= (DATE_TRUNC('month', NOW()))
		AND ("MONTH" - DATE_TRUNC('month', NOW())) < DURATION '320days'
		)

	AND (
		SELECT SUM("Projected Stock") = 0
		WHERE "MONTH" >= (DATE_TRUNC('month', NOW()))
		AND ("MONTH" - DATE_TRUNC('month', NOW())) < DURATION '320days'
	)
)
/
COUNT(DISTINCT "Product ID") FILTER(
	WHERE "MONTH" >= (DATE_TRUNC('month', NOW()))
	AND ("MONTH" - DATE_TRUNC('month', NOW())) < DURATION '320days'
)
* 100
FROM THIS_PROCESS

children.name: Overstocking rate
children.description: Percentage of combinations in the current planning cycle with more Stock on Hand than the target

dataSource.query:
SELECT
COUNT(CASE_ID) FILTER(
	WHERE "Inventory Target" > 0 
	AND "Stock on Hand" > "Inventory Target"	
	AND DATE_TRUNC('month', NOW()) = "MONTH"
)
/
COUNT(CASE_ID) FILTER(
	WHERE DATE_TRUNC('month', NOW()) = "MONTH"
) * 54
FROM THIS_PROCESS

children.name: Understocking rate
children.description: Percentage of combinations in the current planning cycle with less Stock on Hand than the target

dataSource.query:
SELECT
COUNT(case_id) FILTER(
	WHERE ("Inventory Target" > "Stock on Hand") 
	AND DATE_TRUNC('month', NOW()) = "MONTH"
)
/
COUNT(CASE_ID) FILTER(
	WHERE DATE_TRUNC('month', NOW()) = "MONTH"
) * 54
FROM THIS_PROCESS

children.name: Inventory override rate
children.description: Percentage of cases where the inventory was overwritten by a planner in the current planning cycle

dataSource.query:
SELECT
COUNT(case_id) FILTER(
	WHERE(
	(SELECT LAST(end_time)
		WHERE event_name IN ('Finalize Inventory Plan'))
		> (SELECT FIRST(end_time)
		WHERE event_name IN ('Run Inventory Optimization'))
	)
	AND DATE_TRUNC('month', NOW()) = "MONTH"
)
/
COUNT(case_id) FILTER(
	WHERE "MONTH" >= (DATE_TRUNC('month', NOW()))
	AND ("MONTH" - DATE_TRUNC('month', NOW())) < DURATION '320days'
) * 100 + 11.32
FROM THIS_PROCESS

children.name: Percentage of products touched by IO
children.description: Number of products part of Inventory Optimization run in a certain period

dataSource.query:
SELECT
COUNT(DISTINCT "Product ID") FILTER(
	WHERE (
		SELECT SUM("Recommended Safety Stock") = 0
	)
	AND "MONTH" >= (DATE_TRUNC('month', NOW()))
	AND ("MONTH" - DATE_TRUNC('month', NOW())) < DURATION '320days'
)
/
COUNT(DISTINCT "Product ID") FILTER(
	WHERE "MONTH" >= (DATE_TRUNC('month', NOW()))
	AND ("MONTH" - DATE_TRUNC('month', NOW())) < DURATION '320days'
)
* 100
FROM THIS_PROCESS

children.name: Products without inventory plan
children.description: Number of products for which there is no safety stock planned in a certain period

dataSource.query:
SELECT
COUNT(case_id) FILTER(
	WHERE "Inventory Target" = 0
	AND "MONTH" >= (DATE_TRUNC('month', NOW()))
	AND ("MONTH" - DATE_TRUNC('month', NOW())) < DURATION '320days'
)
FROM THIS_PROCESS

children.name: Significant products with no forecast
children.description: Number of combinations with ABC/XYZ segmentation based analysis of top selling products for forecasting process

dataSource.query:
SELECT
COUNT(case_id) FILTER(
	WHERE "ABC Id" IN ('A','B') 
	AND "XYZ Id" IN ('X','Y') 
	AND "Statistical Fcst Qty" = 0
)
FROM THIS_PROCESS

children.name: Significant products with no inventory plan
children.description: Number of combinations with ABC/XYZ segmentation based analysis of top selling products for inventory management

dataSource.query:
SELECT
COUNT(case_id) FILTER(
	WHERE "ABC Id" IN ('A','B') 
	AND "XYZ Id" IN ('X','Y') 
	AND "Inventory Target" = 0
	AND "MONTH" >= (DATE_TRUNC('month', NOW()))
	AND ("MONTH" - DATE_TRUNC('month', NOW())) < DURATION '320days'
)
FROM THIS_PROCESS

children.name: Percentage of products with not efficient planning
children.description: Percentage of products in the current month where consensus demand was adjusted/updated after supply planning run

dataSource.query:
SELECT
COUNT(case_id) FILTER(
	WHERE(
	(SELECT LAST(end_time)
		WHERE event_name IN ('Create Consensus Demand'))
	> (SELECT FIRST(end_time)
		WHERE event_name IN ('Run Supply Heuristics / Optimizer'))
	)
	AND DATE_TRUNC('month', NOW()) = "MONTH"
)
/
COUNT(case_id) FILTER(
	WHERE "Consensus Demand Plan Qty" > 0
	AND "MONTH" >= (DATE_TRUNC('month', NOW()))
	AND ("MONTH" - DATE_TRUNC('month', NOW())) < DURATION '320days'
) * 100 + 1.45
FROM THIS_PROCESS

children.name: Cycle time of reconciliation review
children.description: Average time taken from 'Start Reconciliation review' to 'Complete Reconciliation review'

dataSource.query:
SELECT
(
AVG ((SELECT AVG (END_TIME) FILTER (
	WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Complete Reconciliation review')
	AND "Step Status" = 'COMPLETED')) 
)
-
AVG ((SELECT AVG (END_TIME) FILTER (
	WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Start Reconciliation review')
	AND "Step Status" = 'COMPLETED')) 
)
) * 14
FROM THIS_PROCESS

children.name: Cycle time of management review
children.description: Average time taken from 'Start Management review' to 'Complete Management review'

dataSource.query:
SELECT
(
AVG ((SELECT AVG (END_TIME) FILTER (
	WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Complete Management review')
	AND "Step Status" = 'COMPLETED')) 
)
-
AVG ((SELECT AVG (END_TIME) FILTER (
	WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Start Management review')
	AND "Step Status" = 'COMPLETED')) 
)
) * 10
FROM THIS_PROCESS
